snippet: The former prime minister, Ehud Olmert, is meeting with political leaders and others, but opinion on his chances is divided among political experts.
abstract: Former Israeli Prime Min Ehud Olmert is plotting a comeback that analysts say offers best hope of uniting Israel's fragmented political center, but also shows opposition's desperation in trying to block the seemingly inevitable re-election of Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu; Olmert has spent last several years battling corruption charges.
lead_paragraph: The former prime minister, Ehud Olmert, is meeting with political leaders and others, but opinion on his chances is divided among political experts.

headline.seo: Former Israeli Leader Olmert Plans Comeback After Conviction
headline.main: Olmert Plans Comeback to Challenge Netanyahu
headline.print_headline: Olmert Plans Comeback To Challenge Netanyahu
